page.title: 18LIFE IN BRYNNA
page.content:
A Saturday.
On Saturday I go down my nannas, my mother goes shopping ,and sometimes we go to Bridgend. After that we normaly go home or take the dog for a walk. Then I go out to play. On a Saturday I have a chinese take away meal and watch televison untill it's time to go to bed.
A Sunday. On a Sunday I go swimming sometimes, and when I come back I go out to play. Then about 1.30pm I have my dinner then 5.30pm I go to piano lessons, then I call in my nannas and then I go home watch the televison , have my supper and go to bed. {BY VICKY ELLIS.
